rukus.text: 16|51|Ara allah‌ balechena, ‘tomara du'i ilah grahana karo na [1]; tini'i to ekamatra ilah [2]. Kaje'i tomara sudhu amake'i bhaya kara.’
16|52|Ara asamanasamuhe o yamine ya kichu ache ta tamra'i ebam sarbaksanika anugatya tamra'i prapya [1]. Tarapara'o ki tomara allah‌ chara an'ya kara'o taka'oya abalambana karabe
16|53|ara tomadera kache ye saba niyamata rayeche ta to allah‌ra'i kacha theke; tarapara yakhana duhkha-dain'ya tomaderake sparsa kare takhana tomara tamke'i byakulabhabe daka [1].
16|54|Tarapara yakhana allah‌ tomadera duhkha-dain'ya duribhuta karena takhana tomadera ekadala tadera rabera sathe sirka kare [1]
16|55|amara taderake ya diyechi ta asbikara karara jan'ya. Kaje'i tomara bhoga kare na'o, acire'i tomara janate parabe.

16|56|Ara amara taderake ye riyaka dana kari tara tara eka ansa nirdharana kare [1] tadera jan'ya yadera sambandhe tara kichu'i jane na [2]. Sapatha allah‌ra! Tomara ya mithya udbhabana kara se samparke abasya'i tomaderake prasna kara habe.
16|57|Ara tara nirdharana kare allah‌ra jan'ya [1] kan'ya santana [2]--- tini pabitra, mahimanbita. Ara tadera jan'ya ta'i ya tara kamana kare [3]
16|58|tadera ka'uke yakhana kan'ya santanera susambada deya haya takhana tara mukhamandala kalo haye yaya ebam se asahaniya manasika yantranaya klista haya [1].

16|59|Take ye susambada deya haya, tara glanira karane se nija sampradaya hate atmagopana kare. Se cinta kare hinata satbe'o ki take rekhe debe, naki matite pumte phelabe [1]. Sabadhana! Tara ya sid'dhanta kare ta kata nikrsta
16|60|Yara akherate imana rakhe na yabatiya kharapa udaharana (dosasamuha) tadera'i, ara allah‌ra jan'ya'i yabatiya mahottama gunabali [1] ara tini'i parakramasali, prajnamaya [2].
